MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 20-DEC-2020 19:40.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the G78 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Stuart Crescent and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:40pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:10 PM on Sunday, 20 December 2020
